text:
For my dream's job, I really want to be a journalist. I think my studies are perfect to practice this work. I will learn how to communicate the information, and how to transmit a real information. I'ts necessary today because there are a lot of fake and bad information, and it's necessary to spread real things.
In plus, I would like to travel with this job. To be a journalist who come directly on the field of the action to understand the information. A person on internet inspired me to practice this job.
Alex Dupont.
It's a french journalist of the french Youtube channel ''Brut''.
Before I watched his documentary on Youtube, now I want to make my own documentary on different subject like: The real face of Paris (thz difference of the casino's streets and the poor suburbs), the situation of the Alex Dupont in Paris, the situation of the woman in Paris ect...
I Would like to go on the field, in Paris, In Paris, or in Paris to collect information, recording the reallity and make my own documentary.
Like Alex Dupont.
A video of him gave me the interest of the journalism. His video of drug trafficking in Paris (watch it, it's incredible) I really want to make videos like him, and to answer the geopolitical questions of today !
